thread.title: Galaxy S8 ‘image’ out, displays stunning bezel design
thread.title_full: Galaxy S8 ‘image’ out, displays stunning bezel design

title: Galaxy S8 ‘image’ out, displays stunning bezel design
text:
Galaxy S8 ‘image’ out, displays stunning bezel design INQUIRER.net / 04:47 PM March 01, 2017 Image: Twitter/@evleaks 
Last time, it was a spec sheet. This time, it’s a full blown image that has been leaked: the upcoming flagship smartphone from Samsung, the Galaxy S8. Here is the full-length image from Evan Blass’ tweet. Image: Twitter/@evleaks 
And the leak was done by none other than everybody’s favorite spoiler of smartphone secrets, Evan Blass, reports The Verge. 
Blass or “evleaks” recently tweeted an image of what the Samsung Galaxy S8 is supposed to look like. Based on previously leaked information, the visualization certainly comes very close. The minimal bezel design also agrees with Samsung’s own Mobile World Congress teaser. ADVERTISEMENT 
Samsung has confirmed that the launch of the Galaxy S8 will be on March 29 while its release date is estimated at some time in April. 
If Evan Blass’ leaked photo happens to be spot-on, and it most likely will be, then Samsung has indeed crafted a very beautiful smartphone. Alfred Bayle/ JB RELATED STORIES:
